metadata.title: If She Breathes She's a Thot

content: in a land of purple sands
from the land the Glassmen sprung
such was this race of men
that none could hate or condemn
and no one could suffer ill
for death would the killer kill
they had no need for face or tongue
for each and all saw alike
strange clothing, tantalizing hips and thighs
she had a voice you could not know
a heart they could not recall

metadata.description:
in a land of purple sands — a glasswork city grew
cathedrals of stained glass — and a likewise people too
metadata.title: Purple Sands
